alert.note: Alert for Bay; Walton; Washington (Florida) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued June 13 at 6:10PM EDT until June 13 at 7:15PM EDT by NWS Tallahassee
info.description: The National Weather Service in Tallahassee has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Northern Bay County in the Panhandle of Florida... East central Walton County in the Panhandle of Florida... Southern Washington County in the Panhandle of Florida... * Until 615 PM CDT. * At 509 PM CDT, a severe thunderstorm was located 9 miles west of Vernon, moving southeast at 25 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts and quarter size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Hail damage to vehicles is expected. Expect wind damage to roofs, siding, and trees. * Locations impacted include... Live Oak, Ebro, Red Bay, Fountain, Singer Road, Saunders, Greenhead, Bruce, Red Head, Holmes Valley, Gainer Spring, Millers Ferry, Bennett, Pine Log, Youngstown, Porter Lake and Riverside. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.00 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
